definition: dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，樹莓，櫻桃和李子的芬芳濃郁，呈醬紫色。

sentences.english: Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，樹莓，櫻桃和李子的芬芳濃郁，呈醬紫色。

sentences.english: Immediately his eyes grew wide and his face turned purple.
sentences.chinese: 很快，他的眼睛睜得越來越大，臉成了醬紫色。

sentences.english: Color alone white jade green, sky blue and Jiangzi, color pragmatic , solemn atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 顏色爲獨玉綠白，醬紫及天藍，色澤持重，大氣莊重。
